observationTitle: Persons whose activities bring them into frequent contact with rabies virus or potentially rabid animals
indicationText: Administer to persons whose activities bring them into frequent contact with rabies virus or potentially rabid animals.
clarifyingText: Occupational or recreational activities that typically involve contact with animals include 1) veterinarians, technicians, animal control officers, and their students or trainees; 2) persons who handle wildlife reservoir species (e.g., wildlife biologists, rehabilitators, and trappers); and 3) spelunkers
